name: Is Single Value
description: Check if there are columns which have only a single unique value in all rows.

name: Special Characters
description: Search in column[s] for values that contains only special characters.

name: Mixed Nulls
description: Search for various types of null values, including string representations of null.

name: Mixed Data Types
description: Detect columns which contain a mix of numerical and string values.

name: String Mismatch
description: Detect different variants of string categories (e.g. "mislabeled" vs "mis-labeled") in a categorical column.

name: Data Duplicates
description: Checks for duplicate samples in the dataset.

name: String Length Out Of Bounds
description: Detect strings with length that is much longer/shorter than the identified "normal" string lengths.
